description:
The ZoneKnit™ Long Sleeve Zip is a lightweight midlayer designed to balance warmth and breathability for running, biking and other high-exertion activities. This soft and stretchy layer features ZoneKnit™ engineered body mapping, combining Cool-Lite™ jersey fabric with strategic panels of Cool-Lite™ eyelet mesh on the back and cuffs for enhanced breathability and temperature regulation when you’re on the move. Raglan sleeves and gusseted underarms provide enhanced range of motion, while side stash pockets keep your essentials secure wen you’re on the move.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL®, sourced from sustainable eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker ZoneKnit LS Zip - Mens

specs.value: 60% Lyocell, 40% Merino Wool - Exclusive Of Decoration
